name: CAPITOL SOUTH, LLC ON BEHALF OF COMPETITIVE MARKETS ACTION, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to the Ending Agricultural Trade Suppression (EATS) Act (H.R. 4417/S. 2019), the Farm, Food, and National Security Act of 2024 (H.R.8467), and the upcoming Farm Bill in the Senate.
